title: Energy monitor can find electrical failures before they happen

title_detail.value: Energy monitor can find electrical failures before they happen

summary: A new system can monitor the behavior of all electric devices within a building, ship, or factory, determining which ones are in use at any given time and whether any are showing signs of an imminent failure. When tested on a Coast Guard cutter, the system pinpointed a motor with burnt-out wiring that could have led to a serious onboard fire.
